sentences.english: She walked out on her husband of twenty-five years.
sentences.chinese: 她抛弃了结发二十五年的丈夫。

sentences.english: His wife of 63 years, Mary, predeceased him by 11 months.
sentences.chinese: 和他结发63年的妻子玛丽先于他11个月离开人世。

sentences.english: Hair comb has a meaning, refers to the spouse can spend the love, forever.
sentences.chinese: 梳子有着结发的寓意，指配偶能相守相爱，白头偕老。
